name: AMGEN INC.
sampleDescriptions: Provide advice and strategic counsel with regard to regulations that could impact biopharmaceutical manufacturers generally and Amgen specifically, including Medicare Part D, Medicare Part B, Health Care Reform, Medicaid, 340b, FDA regulatory issues, and corporate tax reform.
